panel.uploadToView: Upload a file to view extracted fields

emptyState.uploadPrompt: Please upload a file or load sample data

toolbar.uploadTooltip: Upload PDF, PNG, or JPG file for testing
toolbar.resetTooltip: Clear all data and reset page state

metadata.title: Document Preview Integration Test | Admin
metadata.description: Epic 13 Document Preview and Field Mapping Component Integration Test Page

mappingConfigPanel.title: Field Mapping Configuration
mappingConfigPanel.description: Configure mapping rules between source fields and target fields, supporting various transform types.

discardDialog.title: Discard unsaved changes?
discardDialog.description: You have unsaved changes. Switching configuration scope will lose these changes. Are you sure you want to continue?

empty.title: No Mapping Rules
empty.description: Click the button below to create your first mapping rule

mappingRuleList.title: Mapping Rules
mappingRuleList.dragHint: Drag to adjust priority, lower number means higher priority

mappingPreview.title: Preview Results
mappingPreview.description: View the transformation effects of mapping rules
mappingPreview.noRules: Please add mapping rules first to view preview
mappingPreview.noData: No preview data. Click "Load Preview" to load.

ruleEditor.description: Configure the mapping relationship and transformation logic from source fields to target fields.

DIRECT.label: Direct Mapping
DIRECT.description: Directly map source value to target field

CONCAT.label: Concatenate
CONCAT.description: Concatenate multiple source fields into one value

validation.title: Validation Error
validation.sourceFieldsRequired: Please select at least one source field
validation.lookupTableRequired: Lookup mode requires selecting a lookup table
validation.formulaRequired: Custom mode requires entering a formula

scope.label: Configuration Scope
scope.formatDesc: Precise rules for specific document format

format.label: Document Format
format.noFormats: No formats available for this company

priorityInfo.title: Mapping Priority
priorityInfo.format: Format: Highest priority, for specific document formats
priorityInfo.company: Company: Overrides global rules, for specific companies
priorityInfo.global: Global: Default rules, applies to all companies

transformConfig.title: Transform Configuration

descriptions.DIRECT: Direct Mapping: Maps source field value directly to target field without any transformation.
descriptions.CONCAT: Concatenate: Combines multiple source field values in sequence with specified delimiter.
descriptions.SPLIT: Split: Splits source field value by delimiter and selects specified index.
descriptions.LOOKUP: Lookup: Finds corresponding target value in lookup table based on source field value.
descriptions.CUSTOM: Custom: Uses custom formula for complex value transformation.

transformConfig.directHint: Direct mapping requires no additional configuration. Source field value will be mapped directly to target field.

delimiter.label: Delimiter
delimiter.tooltip: Delimiter used when concatenating field values
delimiter.splitTooltip: Delimiter used to split source field value

nullHandling.label: Null Handling
nullHandling.tooltip: How to handle empty source field values

defaultValue.label: Default Value
defaultValue.tooltip: Value to use when source is empty
defaultValue.lookupTooltip: Value to use when no match is found in lookup table

splitIndex.label: Split Index
splitIndex.tooltip: Which part to take after splitting (starting from 0)

keepAll.label: Keep All
keepAll.tooltip: When checked, keeps all split results as an array

lookupTable.label: Lookup Table
lookupTable.tooltip: Select lookup table for value transformation

caseSensitive.label: Case Sensitive
caseSensitive.tooltip: Whether to distinguish between uppercase and lowercase letters during lookup

customFormula.label: Custom Formula
customFormula.tooltip: Use JavaScript expression for value transformation. Use $value for source value, $fields for all fields.
